title: Heft Jest Plugin Options Configuration
description: This schema describes the "options" field that can be specified in heft.json when loading "@rushstack/heft-jest-plugin".

disableConfigurationModuleResolution.title: Disable Configuration Module Resolution
disableConfigurationModuleResolution.description: If set to true, modules specified in the Jest configuration will be resolved using Jest default (rootDir-relative) resolution. Otherwise, modules will be resolved using Node module resolution.
